## Description

A clear description of the feature you'd like.

## Problem

What problem does this solve? What's frustrating about the current behavior?

## Proposed Solution

How should this work? Be specific about the behavior you want.

## Use Case

Give a concrete example of how you would use this feature in practice.

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you consider? Why is this one better?

## Additional Context

Any other context, screenshots, or references.
